name: EuroleagueFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Follow the latest news and game recaps from around the Euroleague within Alexa's Flash Briefing. After enabling the skill, say things like "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" Or, "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear your flash briefings. Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find "Flash Briefing" to move Euroleague Flash Briefing to the top of your news brief.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
